title: Introduction to Java
description: Learn the fundamentals of Java programming, including syntax, variables, loops, and OOP basics.

lessons.title: Java Basics
lessons.content: Introduction to Java, setting up JDK, running your first program.

lessons.title: Variables and Data Types
lessons.content: Understanding primitive types, variables, and memory allocation.

title: Object-Oriented Programming
description: Deep dive into OOP concepts such as inheritance, abstraction, polymorphism, and encapsulation.

lessons.title: Classes and Objects
lessons.content: Understanding classes, objects, attributes, methods, and constructors.

lessons.title: Inheritance
lessons.content: How classes can inherit behaviors and attributes from parent classes.

title: Data Structures in Java
description: Learn stacks, queues, linked lists, trees, and how to implement them in Java.

lessons.title: Arrays and Lists
lessons.content: Understanding arrays, ArrayList, and basic operations.

lessons.title: Stacks and Queues
lessons.content: Implementing stacks and queues using arrays and linked lists.
